import React from 'react' import {Card, CardMedia, CardContent, CardActions, Typography, IconButton, Grid, Container} from '@material-ui/core'; import useStyle from './styles' import Product from '../Products/Product/Product'; const SingleProduct = ({product, onAddToCart}) => { const classes= useStyles(); return (
{product.name} {product.price.formatted_with_symbol}
onAddToCart(product.id, 1)} > Visualizza
) } export default SingleProduct
